sources.description: GOOD MORNING, BABYLON Good morning Babilonia Directed by Paolo Taviani , Vittorio Taviani Italy, France, 1987 Drama 117 min. Synopsis After the bankruptcy of their fatherâ€™s stonemasonry firm, brothers Nicola and Andrea emigrate to America to restore their fortunes.
